divs: Sighting DetailsI am not sure I can add much of value to the discription, but it seemed to be dark greyish brown. Mayby a matt finish, or something non glossy that had no observable reflections of light, as a smooth surface would. It seemed to be centered above or focused on the farmhouse. I don't have a witness to the event, because I could not get my passenger to look in the correct direction to see the object untill it was too late and the object had fled quickly, or just dissapeared. I looked away for an instant to talk to the passenger, and it was gone, no trace. It was the first time I seen a craft up close, relatively close. I have seen lights in the sky before from a great distance, and they were distinguished from meteors by the fact that they turned corners instantaneously and were able to accelerate at a great rate of speed. I am aware that these objects may have been unmanned military craft. But the one I seen on Cherry Valley road was definately not any craft known to the public and did not fit any discription of any top secret craft like the stealth series. I did not think it was any known object, and immediately recognized that it was unfamiliar and out of place. When I saw the craft, I felt surprise, cautionary feelings, not necessarily fear as it was quite a ways away. I also felt fascination and belief, as I did not give any credence to ufo sightings in the past, before I saw the far away lights, and the craft hanging over the farm.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Rockford
There were no other sightings in Rockford on or around June 15th 1993
Summary: I was driving down Cherry Valley Rd. and I saw a large disc or cigar shaped object hanging motionless over a farm, just above the large oak trees. It was as large as the whole yard, maybe an acre. From approx. 1000 yds.
